modName: Guild Followers Full Pack -Adds 4 Followers- A Simple Follower Mod
summary:
Description: This mod add about 4 followers from all the Skyrim guilds in
the game without having to do all the quests and everything. This is my 2nd
real mod release, so comments and endorsments would be greatly 
appreciated. Thanks.- Pc4life220 (Alex) P.S A list of all the followers below.
descriptionHtml:
Description: This mod add about 4 followers from all the Skyrim guilds in
the game without having to do all the quests and everything. This is my 2nd
real mod release, so comments and endorsments would be greatly 
appreciated. Thanks.- Pc4life220 (Alex) P.S A list of all the followers below.


List of All of the followers
------------------------------------------
Nightingale Follower: Nightingale Recruit, Found by the Blacksmith in
Riften.

Companions Follower: Sovenur, Found right outside of the Companion\'s
Guild House.

Theives Guild Follower: Victoria Brim, Found in The Ragged Flagon.

College Of Winterhold Follower: College Of Winterhold Student, Found right
outside the front of the College Of Winterhold after you pass the so called
\"Mage\" Test.

!IMPORTANT! Requires Extensible Follower Framework for more than 1 follower at a time, or
else you would have to disband your follower for another.
Download: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933


CREDITS: Bethesda Game Studios (Assets and Skyrim)
Creation Kit (Assets and Editing)
The Elder Scrolls (Games and Inspiration)
author: Pc4life220
